subject: College Athletics
Golf
lead_paragraph: North Carolina State’s Matt Hill eagled his next-to-last hole to tie Georgia’s Russell Henley for the medal lead in the weather-delayed second round of the N.C.A.A. Division I men’s championship at Inverness Club in Toledo, Ohio. Half the field was on the course when darkness fell after a four-and-a-half-hour weather delay.
